Here I post my literary writings, share personal experiences, and talk science (see [Scribbles](./contents/literature/index.html) and [Blog](./contents/blog/index.html)).
I am interesed in the science and philosophy of human and machine cognition: I did my Master's in cognitive neuroscience and PhD in psychology and language sciences.

## Education and training {#education}

**Saarland University** **|** Germany\
PhD -- *magna cum laude* **|** Nov 2018 - Dec 2022\
"*Interaction of top-down and bottom-up processes in spoken language comprehension*"\
Advisors: [Prof. Vera Demberg](https://www.uni-saarland.de/lehrstuhl/demberg/members/verademberg.html), [Prof. Jutta Kray](https://www.uni-saarland.de/lehrstuhl/kray/team/jk.html)

**Basque Center on Cognition, Brain and Language** **|** Spain\
Master in Cognitive Neuroscience of Language **|** Sep 2017 - Sep 2018\
"*Predictability modulates type-1 and type-2 language processing: Spanish-Basque bilingual context*"\
Advisor: [Prof. David Soto](https://www.bcbl.eu/en/conocenos/equipo/david-soto)

**Center for Neural and Cognitive Sciences**, University of Hyderabad **|** India\
Research Intern **|** Dec 2015 - May 2017\
PI: [Prof. Ramesh Kumar Mishra](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=aWaIy0sAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao)

**Institute of Medicine**, Tribhuvan University **|** Nepal\
